traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If the elephant moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.description: *Melee:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 19 (3d8 + 6) Bludgeoning. Can only target a Prone creature.
